donor_name: MINISTRY OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT, TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO
outputs.output_descr:
Identification of of Functions and responsibilities of Local Government Bodies
Development of a functional framework for Local Government 
Draft Legislative Framework and provisions to give effect to the local Government Reform Policy , prescriptions and progammes
To build capacity and encourage the transfer of best practices to Ministry Personnel through the UNV modality

project_descr: The Institutional Strengthening and Support for the Ministry of Local Government (MOLG) seeks to provide technical support to the Ministry to obtain a more decentralized governance system for greater effectiveness and efficiency
project_title: Institutional Strengthening and Support for MoLG
